attributes.action: Legislate to ensure companies pay appropriately for consultant "think tankers".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Another idea from my think tank - what does the rest of the nation think ? A lot of independent companies at the moment advertise to "contact us" with ideas and suggestions - web page feedback - it would be a great boost to the economy if this was a paid practice rather than get the services of consultancies free.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
